channel.title: Driver crash at Surface Tension
channel.description:
One thing after another for me, huh?
Anyways. Playing Surface Tension. Everything's fine. Grab the RPG and started fighting the Apache and BOOM. Outright freeze, I quickly Ctrl+Alt+Del out of the game to see it was a display driver crash that struck me. This always happens when I have a game running on DX9.
So I suppose I have to ask. What can I do to help this not happen? I want to set it to DX8, but I see there's no support for it. Will this change in the Steam release?
